about.details:
Incorporated in 2003, Chaman Metallics Limited is primarily engaged in the business of manufacturing and selling of Direct Reduced Iron (i.e. sponge iron). Sponge iron is mainly used as a raw material for making steel in electric arc furnaces and induction furnaces.

Chaman Metallics has been granted ISO 9001:2015 for its superior management systems, ISO 14001:2015 for environmental management systems, and ISO 45001:2018 for occupational health and safety management system proficiency.

The company manufacturing unit is based in Chandrapur, Maharashtra. The manufacturing facility is spread across an area of around 63 acres of land. The unit has a capacity of 72,000 MT (2 X 100 MTPD) for the production of sponge iron through two Rotary kilns as of March 31, 2022.

The company sell its products primarily in the state of Maharashtra, Odisha and Chhattisgarh. Some of the company's customers include Rajesh Steel & Wire Industries (New), R.K. Steel Sales, SMW Ispat Pvt Ltd, Gajkesari Steels & Alloys Pvt. Ltd etc.

Some of the competitive strengths, Chaman Metallics is proud of, are:

  1. Strategically located manufacturing unit
  2. Stringent quality control mechanism ensuring standardized product quality
  3. Long-standing relationship with our customers
  4. Well Qualified and Experienced Management Team

faqs.question: What is the Chaman Metallics IPO?
faqs.answer:
Chaman Metallics IPO is a SME IPO of 6372000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹24.21 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹38 per share. The minimum order quantity is 3000.

The IPO opens on January 4, 2023, and closes on January 6, 2023.

Link Intime India Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Chaman Metallics IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Chaman Metallics IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Chaman Metallics IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Chaman Metallics IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Chaman Metallics IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Chaman Metallics IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Chaman Metallics IPO opens on January 4, 2023 and closes on January 6, 2023.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Chaman Metallics IPO?
faqs.answer: Chaman Metallics IPO lot size is 3000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,14,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Chaman Metallics IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Chaman Metallics IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Chaman Metallics IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Chaman Metallics IPO will be done on Wednesday, January 11, 2023, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Friday, January 13, 2023. Check the Chaman Metallics IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Chaman Metallics IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Chaman Metallics IPO listing date is on Monday, January 16, 2023.
